experiences.description: Worked in a team of 8 to build a brand new API management portal
tasks: Designed and developed the backend service and the portal.
Created the CI/CD pipeline including quality check and full pyramid testing workflow using ephemeral environments.
Managed release process.
Designed and managed deployment process.
Migrated application from an internal cloud to a public cloud.

experiences.description: Worked in the Deployment team of the Production practices Support Unit
tasks: Guide teams in adopting containerization standards and best practices.
Assess build and release processes.
Document deployment processes and infrastructure.
Assess infrastructure cost and efficiency.

experiences.description: Worked in a team of 5 called ArchOps. Reunite Solution architects and ops of the company
tasks: Migrated on-Premise building tools to AWS.
Migrated pipelines from DroneCI to Jenkis.
Migrated ARender application from GCP to AWS.
Guide teams in building CI/CD pipelines.
Assisted teams on internal tools issues.
